summary: This module implements a class that encapsulates the logic for converting audio files to text using Azure Speech services. It manages authentication, endpoint selection, request preparation, and response handling, offering both synchronous and asynchronous transcription methods that integrate with the litellm framework.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily add Azure-powered speech-to-text functionality to their applications by providing a ready‑to‑use, high‑level transcription interface.
